dungeon_cell.name: A dungeon cell
dungeon_cell.description:
A dungeon cell. It is moist and dark, but a weak light shines through a small barred window just below the ceiling.

Because of the light you see the outlines of the few things in your cell. The door seems very massive and is locked.

Dirty, half rotten straw is lying on the floor.

corridor.name: A narrow corridor
corridor.description:
A narrow corridor. It stretches to the east and to the west, slightly curved.

The hole in the ceiling with the trap door is too high for you to climb back.

You hear a faint noise from the west!
corridor.additional_description: There is a burning torch on a mount on the wall, it flickers and casts creepy shadows.

forward_corridor.name: A narrow corridor
forward_corridor.description:
A narrow corridor. It stretches further to the east, slightly curved, but ends in a solid stone wall.
There is some debris on the floor.

backward_corridor.name: A narrow corridor
backward_corridor.description: A narrow corridor. It stretches further to the west, slightly curved.

entrance_corridor.name: Entrance hall
entrance_corridor.description:
An entrance hall. It stretches to the west, slightly curved. There is a big open portal to the south.
A bright light is shining through the portal!

outside.name: The outside world
outside.description: A meadow! Trees! Singing birds! You are back in the outside world.

straw.name: straw
straw.description: The straw is dirty, rotten and full with vermin. But underneath you see a trap door in the floor!
straw.error_portable:
While touching the rotten straw you feel an iron ring which belongs to a hidden trap door!
But it makes no sense to fill your pockets with the straw, so you leave it where it is.

bucket.name: wooden bucket
bucket.description: A wooden bucket. It appears to be used for... well you can imagine. No other facilities here.
bucket.error_portable: Trust me, you DON'T want to carry THAT around! It is nearly full with... you know.

bed.name: bunk bed
bed.description:
Your bunk bed. Comfortable as a wooden board. Maybe due to the fact that it IS a wooden board.
It is mounted on the wall.

trap_door.name: trap door
trap_door.description: After removing the straw, you can see a trap door in the floor.

barred_window.name: barred window
barred_window.description: It is to high for you, you can't reach it!

barrel.name: barrel
barrel.description: A large barrel, approx. half your height. It seems to be filled with a liquid, probably water.

guard.name: guard
guard.description: A big, dim looking guard. Looks like he could eat you for breakfast.

stone.name: stone
stone.description: A stone the size of a fist.

start_event.name: Awake
start_event.description:
It begins as soon as you wake up, with a searing pain piercing your temples and spreading across your entire head.
Then comes the sickness, the dry mouth and the sudden panic - all accompanied alongside that phrase, "never again".

As soon as you open your eyes you realize: This is no hangover. Something terrible must have happened.
You are not in your bedroom, but in a dark, moist and cold room lying on a hard wooden bunk.
You have lost your memories of yesterday, the last thing you remember is... you are not sure WHAT you remember.

trapdoor.name: Open trapdoor
trapdoor.description: You open the trap door with its large metal ring. The opening reveals a small corridor below your cell.
trapdoor.action_new_location_description: An open trap door leads down.

get_torch.description:
The torch makes it easier to find your way. The dungeon down here is mostly dark.
But you will be seen immediately with the bright torch in your hands.
get_torch.action_new_location_description: There is an empty mount on the wall, scorch marks around it suggest that there has been a lit torch in the mount.

guard_trigger.description: You see a big guard standing in a corner of the room. He doesn't look into your direction, yet.

hide_barrel.description: You duck and hide behind the barrel. The guard seems to have not yet noticed you.
hide_barrel.action_new_location_description: You are hidden behind the barrel.

unhide_barrel.description: You are pretty sure that the guard has not seen you.

throw_stone_at_guard_hidden.description: You throw the stone at the guard. You hit him on his head and he sinks to the ground.

throw_stone_at_guard.description: You try to throw the stone. But the guard is quicker.

arest.name: The guard arests you!
arest.description:
The guard points his sword into your direction. "You! Don't move!" he barks.

You stand still. He grabs your arm with his free hand and turns you around in a swift movement.
Afterwards he hits you with his sword handle on the back of your head.

Again, it gets dark around you when you loose consciousness...

arest_torch.description: The guard immediately turns around. He must have seen your torch!

end_event.description: You managed to find out of the dungeon! Congratulations. The game is now over.

demo.name: Demo
demo.description: This is the demo event! Just for testing purposes...
